verses.verse: <WH5186> Hear,<WH241> Yahweh,<WH3068> and answer<WH6030> me,<WH6041> for I am poor and needy.<WH6041>
Preserve<WH8104> my soul,<WH5315> for I am godly.<WH2623> You,<WH430> my God, save<WH3467> your servant<WH5650> who trusts in you.<WH982>
Be merciful<WH2603> to me,<WH136> Lord, for I call<WH7121> to you all day long.<WH3117>
Bring joy<WH8055> to the soul<WH5315> of your servant,<WH5650> for to you,<WH136> Lord, do I lift up<WH5375> my soul.<WH5315>
For you,<WH136> Lord, are good,<WH2896> and ready to forgive;<WH5546> abundant<WH7227> in loving kindness<WH2617> to all those who call on you.<WH7121>
Hear,<WH238> Yahweh,<WH3068> my prayer.<WH8605> Listen<WH238> to the voice<WH6963> of my petitions.<WH8469>
In the day<WH3117> of my trouble<WH6869> I will call<WH7121> on you,<WH6030> for you will answer me.
There is no one like you among the gods,<WH430> Lord,<WH136> nor any deeds like your deeds.<WH4639>
All nations<WH1471> you have made<WH6213> will come<WH935> and worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> you,<WH136> Lord. They shall glorify<WH3513> your name.<WH8034>
For you are great,<WH1419> and do<WH6213> wondrous things.<WH6381> You are God alone.<WH430>
Teach<WH3384> me your way,<WH1870> Yahweh.<WH3068> I will walk<WH1980> in your truth.<WH571> Make my heart<WH3824> undivided<WH3161> to fear<WH3372> your name.<WH8034>
I will praise<WH3034> you,<WH136> Lord my God,<WH430> with my whole heart.<WH3824> I will glorify<WH3513> your name<WH8034> forevermore.<WH5769>
For your loving kindness<WH2617> is great<WH1419> toward me.<WH5337> You have delivered my soul<WH5315> from the lowest<WH8482> Sheol.<WH7585>

God,<WH430> the proud<WH2086> have risen<WH6965> up against me.<WH5712> A company of violent<WH6184> men have sought<WH1245> after my soul,<WH5315> and they don't<WH7760> hold regard for you before them.
But you,<WH136> Lord, are a merciful<WH7349> and gracious<WH2587> God,<WH410> slow<WH750> to anger,<WH7227> and abundant in loving kindness<WH2617> and truth.<WH571>
Turn<WH6437> to me,<WH2603> and have mercy on me!<WH5414> Give your strength<WH5797> to your servant.<WH5650> Save<WH3467> the son<WH1121> of your handmaid.<WH519>

Show<WH6213> me a sign<WH226> of your goodness,<WH2896> that those who hate<WH8130> me may see<WH7200> it,<WH954> and be shamed, because you,<WH3068> Yahweh, have helped<WH5826> me,<WH5162> and comforted me.
